players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I saw Bob last night and he seemed fine. I'm not sure what happened to him."
You: "Bob was acting suspiciously last night. He seemed nervous and kept looking over his shoulder."
Charlie: "I've investigated Alice and found her to be the mafioso. Bob's death is suspicious, and I believe she was involved."
